title: Homepage Loads and Displays All Sections Correctly
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully and displays hero carousel, categories navigation, flash deals, trending products, curated collections, trust badges, testimonials, Instagram feed, and newsletter subscription elements.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL.
Verify the hero carousel is visible and cycles through images.
Verify category navigation links are present and clickable.
Verify flash deals and trending products sections are displayed with correct product data.
Check curated collections, trust badges, and testimonials are displayed correctly.
Verify Instagram feed and newsletter subscription form are displayed and functional.

title: Product Catalog Filters and Sorting Functionality
description: Verify product catalog filters, sorting, search, and pagination work correctly and display accurate product listings.

steps.description: Navigate to the product catalog page.
Apply multiple filters (e.g., category, price range, vendor) and verify product listings update accordingly.
Apply sorting options like price low to high and high to low, confirm correct order of products.
Use the search bar to search for a specific product and verify results include only matching items.
Navigate between pages of results using pagination controls.
All filtered, sorted, and paginated results match the applied criteria with no errors.

title: Product Detail Displays Correct Information and Variants
description: Verify product detail page shows images gallery, variant options, product description, reviews with verified purchase badges, recommendations, and allows adding to cart.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from catalog or search.
Verify image gallery loads with multiple images and can be navigated.
Verify variant selectors (size, color, etc.) update displayed product info and pricing.
Check product description and specifications match backend data.
Verify product reviews show verified purchase badges and ratings correctly.
Add product with specific variant to cart and verify cart updates.

title: Shopping Cart Item Management and Price Calculation
description: Verify shopping cart displays added items with correct quantities, allows updating quantity or removing items, and calculates prices and totals accurately.

steps.description: Add multiple different products to the cart.
Verify cart lists all added products with correct quantities and prices.
Update quantity of an item and verify price and total update immediately.
Remove an item from cart and verify it is no longer displayed and totals adjust.
Verify cart summary displays accurate subtotal, taxes, and estimated totals.

title: Complete Multi-step Checkout with Valid Shipping and Payment
description: Verify the checkout flow completes successfully including entering shipping address, selecting shipping options, payment via Stripe, and order confirmation.

steps.description: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout.
Enter valid shipping information and continue.
Choose valid shipping options and proceed.
Select payment method and provide Stripe payment details.
Submit order and verify order confirmation page is shown with correct details.
Verify Stripe payment session completes successfully and webhook updates order status.

title: User Authentication - Registration, Login, Logout, and Session Management
description: Verify user registration with email/password and Google OAuth, login success/failure scenarios, logout, and session persistence with Redis caching.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page and register with valid email and password.
Verify registration completes and user is logged in automatically.
Log out user.
Try to login with correct credentials and verify success.
Try to login with incorrect password and verify failure message.
Login using Google OAuth and verify successful authentication.
Verify session persists across page reloads and expires correctly after logout.

title: User Account Dashboard Operations
description: Verify authenticated users can access their account dashboard, view order history, manage profile information, addresses, and wishlist adding/removing items.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user and navigate to account dashboard.
Verify order history is displayed with accurate details.
Update profile information and save changes.
Verify profile updates are persisted.
Add a new shipping address and verify it appears in the address list.
Add and remove products from wishlist and verify persistence across sessions.

title: Global Search with Autocomplete and Multi-tab Filtering
description: Verify global search bar provides autocomplete suggestions and result views are segmented into product, category, and other types with multi-tab filtering.

steps.description: Enter partial product/category name in the global search bar.
Verify autocomplete suggestions appear for products and categories.
Select autocomplete suggestion or submit search query.
Verify search results page displays multi-tab navigation (Products, Categories, etc).
Switch between tabs and verify correct filtered results are displayed.

title: Admin Panel CRUD Operations with Role-based Access Control
description: Verify admin users with different roles can access admin panel and perform create, read, update, delete (CRUD) operations on products, categories, orders, users, vendors, campaigns, promo codes while enforcing permissions and audit logging.

steps.description: Login to admin panel as admin with full permissions.
Create new product, category, vendor, and campaign entries.
Verify new entries are saved and displayed correctly.
Edit existing entries and save changes.
Verify edits are persisted and reflected in listings.
Delete entries and confirm removal from system.
Login as admin with restricted permissions.
Verify restricted admin user cannot access or perform unauthorized actions.
Check audit logs for recorded admin actions.
Verify significant admin CRUD operations are logged with timestamps and user IDs.

title: Stripe Payment Integration and Webhook Processing
description: Verify Stripe integration processes payments successfully including creating payment sessions, handling Stripe webhook events to update order status, and notifying users.

steps.description: Start checkout and select Stripe as payment method.
Complete payment through Stripe test environment.
Verify payment session is created and redirects correctly.
Simulate Stripe webhook for payment success and verify order status updates to 'Paid'.
Check user receives order confirmation notification.
Simulate payment failure webhook and verify order status updates accordingly.

title: API Endpoint Validation for Products, Categories, Orders
description: Verify REST API endpoints for products, categories, and orders correctly support CRUD operations, filtering, sorting, pagination, and enforce permission and validation rules.

steps.description: Send GET requests with various filters, sorting, and pagination parameters and verify expected results.
Send POST requests to create new resources with valid and invalid data.
Verify successful creation with valid data and appropriate error messages with invalid data.
Send PUT/PATCH requests for updates with valid and invalid data.
Verify updates are applied only with valid data and permission.
Send DELETE requests and verify resource removal.
Attempt unauthorized API requests and verify access is denied.

title: Wishlist Functionality Persistence Across Sessions
description: Verify wishlist operations including adding, removing items, and persistence across user sessions using Zustand client state management.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user.
Add multiple products to wishlist.
Verify items appear in wishlist.
Logout and close browser.
Login again and verify wishlist items are persisted.
Remove items from wishlist and verify they are removed immediately.

title: Cache Invalidation and ISR Revalidation Mechanisms
description: Verify cache invalidation after product or category data changes triggers on-demand ISR cache revalidation to update storefront with fresh data.

steps.description: Edit product or category data via admin panel.
Verify on-demand ISR cache revalidation API triggers.
Access relevant storefront pages.
Verify updated data is reflected with no stale content.

title: Responsive UI Rendering and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify all main UI pages and components render correctly on various device sizes and comply with WCAG AA accessibility standards.

steps.description: Load key pages (homepage, catalog, product detail, checkout, account dashboard) on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.
Verify layout adapts correctly with no overflow or truncated elements.
Verify all images have alt attributes.
Test keyboard navigation through interactive elements.
Verify color contrast ratios comply with WCAG AA.

title: Real-time Notifications and Analytics Dashboards Update
description: Verify real-time notifications appear within admin interface for order updates and marketing campaign alerts and analytics dashboards update reflecting latest data.

steps.description: Trigger order status update to 'Shipped' via admin or webhook.
Verify real-time notification appears in admin notification area.
Create or modify marketing campaign and send email/SMS test.
Verify analytics dashboard updates relevant campaign metrics immediately.

title: Security Test for Protected Routes and API Endpoints
description: Verify that all protected frontend routes and API endpoints enforce authentication and authorization based on user roles and permissions.

steps.description: Attempt access to admin panel routes without login.
Verify redirect to login page or access denied.
Login as regular user and attempt to access admin resources.
Verify access is denied for unauthorized actions.
Send API requests to protected endpoints without token and with invalid tokens.
Verify responses return 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden as appropriate.

title: Product Reviews Submission and Verification Badge Display
description: Verify users can submit product reviews, reviews are stored with authentication verification, and verified purchase badges display correctly on reviews.

steps.description: Login as user who purchased product.
Navigate to product detail page and submit a review with rating and text.
Verify review is accepted and visible immediately or after moderation.
Verify review displays a verified purchase badge.
Login as user who has not purchased the product and attempt to submit review.
Verify review submission is blocked or flagged accordingly.

title: Email System Sends Notification Emails Correctly
description: Verify system sends notification emails on user registration, order confirmation, password reset and admin alerts for critical events.

steps.description: Register new user with valid email.
Verify registration confirmation email is received.
Place a new order and verify order confirmation email is sent.
Request password reset and verify reset email delivery.
Trigger an admin alert (e.g., low stock) and verify notification email is sent.
